text: Biddeford is a city in York County, Maine, United States. The population was 22,552 at the 2020 census. Its twin city is Saco, Maine.Maine Resource Guide: Biddeford, York County The town is the site of the University of New England and the annual La Kermesse Franco-Americaine Festival. It is the site of one of the earliest European settlements in the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * City of Biddeford, Maine * McArthur Public Library * Biddeford at Maine.gov * University of New England Category:Cities in Maine
title: Biddeford, Maine
